info.name: Custom Background
info.description: Basic template for a custom background.
info.author: Xellarant

description.p: Life, depending on your point of view, is a series of random events. Any number of things have led you to where you've gotten thusfar, and it's up to you to tell the story.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: You can select any two skills to be proficient with
Language/Tool Proficiencies: Any two of your choice
Equipment: Some sort of trinket, a set of clothes, the tool you choose for this background’s tool proficiency, and a pouch containing 15 gp

description.p: I could tell you, by your background, how you may think and behave today, but, truthfully, every human being is different and very little about people is ever truly that straightforward.

setters.set: 2 of Any Skill, 2 from any Language or Tool, Variable Background Feature

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I'm often more guarded (even covert) than I need to be.
I'm way more open than most.
I compulsively plan everything or it just doesn't feel right.
I try and be agreeable, and I help when I see those in need.
I get pissed off really easily.
Honestly? Nothing bothers me. I'm a "go with the flow" kinda guy.
I'm in it for the thrill. Anything for an adrenaline rush.
If I don't succeed the first time, I'll be back to try again.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: I just want to sleep the final sleep knowing I was at least somewhat righteous. (Good)
The law is dumb. Beliefs are fine, but know that I might disagree. (Chaotic)
I usually agree or disagree with things depending on if it benefits me. (Neutral)
Capricious. That's the word many people use to describe me. Whether or not I agree depends on my mood. (Any)
I strongly believe in a thing, and I'll likely follow and/or fight for it. (Lawful)
I want things, but society always deems those things to be bad. (Evil)

select.name: Bond
select.item: There's a particular person or group of people who holds great influence over me/my actions.
I bond with people easily and care for nearly everyone I meet.
There are certain people I care about, but I'd much rather see others burn in a fire.
I care about a decent amount of people, but I wouldn't risk my neck for them.
I am absolutely in love with someone. That fact shapes me.
I detest someone or a group of people and often work toward their demise.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am quick to betray if it means my own gain.
I don’t have allies, only pawns and tools.
I'm way too attached to hedonistic desires.
Capricious. That's the word many people use to describe me. I'm told it's not usually good.
I'd honestly risk/do too much for my ideals or my bonds.
Try as I might, I just can't seem to hide my social quirk.

description.p: Linguistic. Your background gives you two language proficiencies.
Handy. Your background gives you two tool proficiencies.
Versatile. Your background gives you one language proficiency and one tool proficiency.
